name: Go to Sleep?
description:
Made during the "blackthornprod Game Jam" in 7 days. The theme was "Less Is More"

You play as a character who suffers sleep paralysis. You have to survive your dream. 

The more you carry stones, the slower you will get.

AUDIO DESIGNER LINKS
